title: Bellamy's Daintree: where reef meets rainforest
creator_credit: Wilderness Society and Australian Conservation Foundation
brief_description: David Bellamy shows how quickly our rainforests - the most diverse living system on land - are disappearing. He then catalogues the reasons why we should not be destroying our few remaining rainforests including genetic reserves retained in these forests.
